verses.plain: In that day shall this song be sung in the land of Judah; We have a strong city; salvation will God appoint for walls and bulwarks.

tokens.t: In that day shall this song be sung in the land of Judah; We have a strong city; salvation will
appoint
walls and bulwarks.

verses.plain: Open ye the gates, that the righteous nation which keepeth the truth may enter in.

tokens.t: Open ye the gates, that the righteous nation which keepeth the truth may enter in.

verses.plain: Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on thee: because he trusteth in thee.

tokens.t: Thou wilt keep
in perfect peace,
mind
stayed
because he trusteth in thee.

verses.plain: Trust ye in the LORD for ever: for in the LORD JEHOVAH is everlasting strength:

tokens.t: Trust ye in the
for ever: for in the
everlasting strength:

verses.plain: ¶ For he bringeth down them that dwell on high; the lofty city, he layeth it low; he layeth it low, even to the ground; he bringeth it even to the dust.

tokens.t: ¶ For he bringeth down them that dwell on high; the lofty city, he layeth it low; he layeth it low,
to the ground; he bringeth it
to the dust.

verses.plain: The foot shall tread it down, even the feet of the poor, and the steps of the needy.

tokens.t: The foot shall tread it down,
the feet of the poor,
the steps of the needy.

verses.plain: The way of the just is uprightness: thou, most upright, dost weigh the path of the just.

tokens.t: The way of the just
uprightness: thou, most upright, dost weigh the path of the just.

verses.plain: Yea, in the way of thy judgments, O LORD, have we waited for thee; the desire of our soul is to thy name, and to the remembrance of thee.

tokens.t: Yea, in the way of thy judgments, O
, have we waited for thee; the desire of
soul
to thy name, and to the remembrance of thee.

verses.plain: With my soul have I desired thee in the night; yea, with my spirit within me will I seek thee early: for when thy judgments are in the earth, the inhabitants of the world will learn righteousness.

tokens.t: With my soul have I desired thee in the night; yea, with my spirit within me will I seek thee early: for when thy judgments
in the earth, the inhabitants of the world will learn righteousness.

verses.plain: Let favour be shewed to the wicked, yet will he not learn righteousness: in the land of uprightness will he deal unjustly, and will not behold the majesty of the LORD.

tokens.t: Let favour be shewed to the wicked,
will he not learn righteousness: in the land of uprightness will he deal unjustly, and will not behold the majesty of the

verses.plain: LORD, when thy hand is lifted up, they will not see: but they shall see, and be ashamed for their envy at the people; yea, the fire of thine enemies shall devour them.

tokens.t: thy hand is lifted up, they will not see:
they shall see, and be ashamed for
envy at the people; yea, the fire of thine enemies shall devour them.

verses.plain: ¶ LORD, thou wilt ordain peace for us: for thou also hast wrought all our works in us.

tokens.t: , thou wilt ordain peace for us: for thou also hast wrought all our works in us.

verses.plain: O LORD our God, other lords beside thee have had dominion over us: but by thee only will we make mention of thy name.

tokens.t: O
our God,
lords beside thee have had dominion over us:
by thee only will we make mention of thy name.

verses.plain: They are dead, they shall not live; they are deceased, they shall not rise: therefore hast thou visited and destroyed them, and made all their memory to perish.

tokens.t: dead, they shall not live;
deceased, they shall not rise: therefore hast thou visited and destroyed them, and made all their memory to perish.

verses.plain: Thou hast increased the nation, O LORD, thou hast increased the nation: thou art glorified: thou hadst removed it far unto all the ends of the earth.

tokens.t: Thou hast increased the nation, O
, thou hast increased the nation: thou art glorified: thou hadst removed
far
all the ends of the earth.

verses.plain: LORD, in trouble have they visited thee, they poured out a prayer when thy chastening was upon them.

tokens.t: , in trouble have they visited thee, they poured out a prayer
thy chastening
upon them.

verses.plain: Like as a woman with child, that draweth near the time of her delivery, is in pain, and crieth out in her pangs; so have we been in thy sight, O LORD.

tokens.t: Like as a woman with child,
draweth near the time of her delivery, is in pain,
crieth out in her pangs; so have we been in thy sight, O

verses.plain: We have been with child, we have been in pain, we have as it were brought forth wind; we have not wrought any deliverance in the earth; neither have the inhabitants of the world fallen.

tokens.t: We have been with child, we have been in pain, we have as it were brought forth wind; we have not wrought any deliverance in the earth; neither have the inhabitants of the world fallen.

verses.plain: Thy dead men shall live, together with my dead body shall they arise. Awake and sing, ye that dwell in dust: for thy dew is as the dew of herbs, and the earth shall cast out the dead.

tokens.t: Thy dead
shall live,
my dead body shall they arise. Awake and sing, ye that dwell in dust: for thy dew
the dew of herbs, and the earth shall cast out the dead.

verses.plain: ¶ Come, my people, enter thou into thy chambers, and shut thy doors about thee: hide thyself as it were for a little moment, until the indignation be overpast.

tokens.t: ¶ Come, my people, enter thou into thy chambers, and shut thy doors about thee: hide thyself as it were for a little moment, until the indignation be overpast.

verses.plain: For, behold, the LORD cometh out of his place to punish the inhabitants of the earth for their iniquity: the earth also shall disclose her blood, and shall no more cover her slain.

tokens.t: For, behold, the
cometh out of his place to punish the inhabitants of the earth for their iniquity: the earth also shall disclose her blood, and shall no more cover her slain.

footnotes.text: everlasting…: Heb. the rock of ages
